name: Ground Beef Stroganoff Casserole
author: Brad Ryan
summary: This incredibly easy casserole recipe for ground beef stroganoff is the perfect comfort food that is filling, yet still weight-loss friendly.
ingredients: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  fat-free condensed cream of mushroom soup (such as Campbell's®)
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Spray a 9x13-inch baking dish with cooking spray
Spray a large nonstick skillet with cooking spray and set over medium-high heat
Cook, breaking up, until browned, about 10 minutes
Stir mushrooms, onion, and garlic into the skillet
Cook and stir until onion is tender, about 2 minutes
Add wine; reduce heat to low and simmer for 3 minutes
Add cream of mushroom soup, sour cream, and mustard
Put cooked noodles in a large bowl and pour beef mixture over; toss to coat
Pour into the prepared baking dish and cover with aluminum foil
Bake in the preheated oven until bubbling, about 25 minutes
